舩字的基本解释

舩
chuán
同“船”。

舩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chuán］
［《廣韻》食川切，平仙，船。］
亦作“舩1”。
(1)水上主要运输工具的总称。
(2)用船运载。
(3)指酒杯。
(4)方言，衣纽。

舩字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【舟字部】　舩； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1009第26
【廣韻】食川切。與船同。【史記·佞幸傳】鄧通以濯舩爲黃頭郞。【淮南子·道應訓】至於中流，陽侯之波，兩蛟夾繞其舩。

舩字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
舩字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [chuán]
["Guangyun" Shichuanqie, Pingxian, boat. ]
Also known as "舩1".
(1) The general term for the main water transport vehicles.
(2) Carry by ship.
(3) Refers to wine glasses.
(4) Dialect, Yi Niu.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set next] [Department of boat characters] 　舩; Kangxi strokes: 10; Page number: page 1009 page 26
[Guangyun] Shichuan cuts. Same as the ship. [Historical Records · Ning Xing Biography] Deng Tong named Zhuoqi as Huang Touyun. [Huainanzi·Tao Yingxun] As for the middle stream, the wave of Yanghou, two floods surround the boat.
